Class TerrainExample

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.TerrainExample

public class TerrainExample
extends java.lang.Object

Example that shows how to use the terrain generator to make a terrain mesh without having the viewer / Swing / JOGL etc.
